data.content:
# MkDocs Documentation Site

## What Was Created
Complete MkDocs Material documentation site for ANEM16pipe.

## Files Created (15)
- `mkdocs.yml` — Config with Material theme, Mermaid, dark mode, search
- `docs/stylesheets/extra.css` — Custom CSS for bit-field diagrams and stage badges
- `docs/index.md` — Home page with architecture overview and quick reference
- `docs/isa/index.md` — ISA overview with format diagrams and color legend
- `docs/isa/r-type.md` — ADD, SUB, AND, OR, XOR, NOR, SLT, SGT, MUL
- `docs/isa/s-type.md` — SHL, SHR, SAR, ROL, ROR
- `docs/isa/memory.md` — LW, SW
- `docs/isa/immediates.md` — LIU, LIL, LIW, ADDI
- `docs/isa/branches.md` — J, JAL, JR, BZ, BHLEQ
- `docs/isa/hilo.md` — LHH/LHL/LLH/LLL, AIH/AIL/AIS, MFHI/MFLO/MTHI/MTLO
- `docs/isa/stack.md` — PUSH, POP, SPRD, SPWR
- `docs/isa/interrupt.md` — SYSCALL, RETI, EI, DI, MFEPC, MFECA, MTEPC
- `docs/pipeline.md` — 5-stage pipeline, forwarding, hazards, module hierarchy
- `docs/assembler.md` — Syntax, directives, pseudo-instructions, full reference
- `docs/testing.md` — Running tests, adding tests, debugging tips

## Features
- Material theme with dark/light mode toggle
- CSS bit-field encoding diagrams (colored by field type)
- Mermaid pipeline timing diagrams
- Admonitions for warnings, notes, tips
- Tabbed examples for flush slot conventions
- Full-text search
- Responsive navigation with sections

## Commands
- `mkdocs build` — Generate static site in `site/`
- `mkdocs serve` — Local dev server with live reload
data.context: Created MkDocs Material documentation site for ANEM16pipe
data.title: MkDocs Documentation Site Created
